package.description:
The controller manager (CM) package provides the infrastructure to run controllers in a hard realtime loop. In every cycle of the control loop, all controllers loaded into CM will get triggered. The order in in which the controllers are triggered is determined by the CM scheduler. CM provides ros service calls to load/start/stop/unlaod controllers.
The controller manager also enforces low level safety limits on the effort/velocity/position of each joint.
